snippet: Giving employers another year before they will be required to offer health insurance is a sensible decision.
abstract: Editorial supports Obama administration decision to give employers another year before they will be required to make available affordable health insurance to their workers or pay a fine; notes downside to delay is that it provides Republican critics with ammunition to portray health care reform as a failure and could encourage other companies to demand exemptions from rules they do not like.
lead_paragraph: Giving employers another year before they will be required to offer health insurance is a sensible decision.
